text: @NikkiHaley Yet, no one has defunded police. Maybe rise is Trump and McConnell have shown next to no leadership or positive direction when comes to coronavirus & unemployment. Mixed messages on unemployment assistance & insurance. 1 time injection of $1,200? Could u live on that Haley?
